head.supplied: ¶ [As I have flowers and fruit now of ¶ Calophyllum ¶ , ¶ I will be able to determine the species. ¶ ¶ The many flowers in alcohol are particularly valuable for dissection. Be so kind as not to gi...

div.p: GRG 19/391, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Undated fragment. English translations are inserted in brackets after each section of the text. Neither record number is present in MEL (AVH, accessed 2 June 2022).

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: but see M to M. Holtze, 2 October 1890.
This was part of a consignment held up by a shipping strike, see M to M. Holtze, 31 August and 13 September 1890.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: I have not yet definitively established that this was part of that consignment. Possibly, but ….

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt; font-weight: bold;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 9pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: relationship not yet established; there may be a number of items to merge when this is sorted out

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Neu für Australien Es fehlen aber Blumen.
[New for Australia. But flowers are lacking.]

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.seg: Könnten von diesem vielleicht neuen Eriocaulon Exemplare erhalten werden mit

cell.p: [Could specimens with ripe seeds be obtained of this perhaps new Eriocaulon ?]

p.seg: Da ich jezt Blüthen und Früchte von Calophyllum habe, werde ich die Art nun feststellen können.
Die vielen Blumen in Alcohol sind für Zergliederung besonders werthvoll. Seien Sie [so]

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

p.seg: freundlich, keine Exemplare irgend einer Art irgendwie abzugeben, die noch nicht vollständig specifisch untersucht ist.

div.p:
[As I have flowers and fruit now of Calophyllum ,
There is a Calophyllum as record number 1118, undated. W ith flowers; s.n. flowers and buds 1890 MEL 0075511A. To be thought about when dating: implies that there was an earlier one not identified beyond genus
I will be able to determine the species.

The many flowers in alcohol are particularly valuable for dissection. Be so kind as not to give away any specimen some way or other of any kind, that has not yet been fully examined as to its specific identity.]
